flags.name: dom.payments.request.enabled
flags.value_to_set: true

flags.name: dom.payments.request.supportedRegions
flags.value_to_set: A comma-delimited list of one or more 2-character ISO country codes indicating the countries in which to support payments (for example, US,CA).
